original_text: And she said to the king, It was a true report that I heard in mine own land of thy acts and of thy wisdom.
korean_text: 왕께 말하되 내가 내 나라에서 당신의 행위와 당신의 지혜에 대하여 들은 소문이 사실이로다

sentences.original_text: And she said to the king,
It was a true report that I heard
of thy acts and of thy wisdom.
